snippet.title: Every Extend (2004, Kanta Matsuhisa a.k.a. "Omega") - Chain Reaction Gameplay
snippet.description:
Gameplay of Every Extend  (2004, Kanta Matsuhisa a.k.a. "Omega") demonstrating how the game's self-destruct mechanic is strategically used to create chain reactions and increase score.

For more information see Chapter 10 of History of Digital Games: Developments in Art, Design and Interaction by Andrew Williams available now from CRC Press.

https://www.crcpress.com/History-of-Digital-Games-Developments-in-Art-Design-and-Interaction/Williams/p/book/9781138885554?source=igodigital
